home_page_description: This is the home page of your document management application.
manage_documents_info: Manage your documents, search for services, and streamline your workflow with ease.
intro_description: Streamline your document management effortlessly. Discover a seamless way to handle documents, access essential services, and improve productivity.
copy_services_description: High-quality document copying and printing services.
notary_services_description: Certified notary services for official documents.
form_filling_services_description: Quickly and easily fill in your documents with our automatic form-filling feature. Save time by avoiding manual data entry.
ocr_services_description: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for business needs, coming soon.
benefit_1: Save time and reduce errors with automated document handling.
benefit_2: Wide range of services from trusted providers.
benefit_3: User-friendly platform accessible from any device.
get_started_description: Sign up today and streamline your document management.

password.min: Password must be at least 6 characters
password.pattern: Password can only contain Latin letters, numbers, and symbols

manage_documents: Manage your documents, find services, and streamline your workflow with ease.

features.feature_1: Easily organize and access all your important documents.
features.feature_2: Quickly find and connect with service providers.
features.feature_3: Automate document filling to save time and reduce errors.

login_info: Sign in to access your documents and streamline your workflow.

login_features.feature_1: Access all your documents in one place.
login_features.feature_3: Manage tasks efficiently and reduce errors.

about_description: CopyDo is an innovative platform for document management and interaction with service providers.
user_benefits_description: Get easy access to necessary documents, automate processes, and save time.
provider_benefits_description: Expand your client base and offer services online with platform support.
business_benefits_description: Manage tasks, increase process efficiency, and grow your business.
feature_form_filling_description: Fill routine documents quickly and accurately with automation.
feature_service_search_description: Easily find the services and providers you need to accomplish your tasks.
feature_online_services_description: Access necessary services online without leaving your home.
feature_time_saving_description: Accelerate processes to reduce the time spent on everyday tasks.
